SignUpDescription: Aapake dvaara darj kiya gaya number aapake Raahi App khaate se link ho jaega aur uspe OTP bheja jaega.
LogInDescription: Apane Raahi App se juda mobile number darj karen.
OtpDescription: An OTP has been sent to your registered mobile number, It will expire in 3 minutes.
HomePageDescription: Raahi mein aapka swagat hai, jo aapke praudhvastha ki yatra mein aapka dost, saathi, aur margdarshak hai.
LearningJourneyDescription: Chuniye woh vishay jise aapko jaankari chahiye. Kuch vishayon ke liye aapko ek kram me jaana hoga.

spalshImages.Title: Learning Journey
spalshImages.Description: Apane shaareerik, maanasik, yaun aur prajanan svaasthy ke baare mein jaanen.

spalshImages.Title: Linkages
spalshImages.Description: Career evan sarakaaree yojanaon se sambandhit jaanakaaree.

spalshImages.Title: Newsfeed
spalshImages.Description: Apane jaiseyuva on se prerana len.

spalshImages.Title: Ask SNEHA
spalshImages.Description: SNEHA se apane prashnon ka uttar paen.
